oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Is This The Day - Sol Hoopii and Ira Stanphill performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Is This The Day, written by Ira Stanphill, and performed by Sol Hoopii (hawaiian guitar) and Ira Stanphill (vocals).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sol Hoopii; Ira Stanphill
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Ira Stanphill and Sol Hoopii perform "Is This The Day"
